alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 5:01PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lafayette, northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson, northern Taylor and southern Madison Counties through 545 PM EST... At 501 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Madison to 10 miles northwest of Perry to 11 miles east of Woodville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perry, Hells Half Acre, Ebb, Buckville, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove, Goose Pasture, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Chancey, Secotan, Boyd, Smith and Hopewell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Lafayette; Madison
